timeline.bodyText: Stupid question ... but ... On line 692 you create topic original-topic and here you just list it and check it has the right name? Because how do you know this is not the initial topic you created when using single namespace? I guess you could say that if on line 725 you can read the mirrored messages from the topic original-topic it worked. But this should be either fixed or removed.
